lead_paragraph: Roger Federer has delayed his return and plans to make his comeback from knee surgery at the Monte Carlo Masters in April.

headline.main: Roger Federer Postpones Return to Competition

snippet: Roger Federer has delayed his return and plans to make his comeback from knee surgery at the Monte Carlo Masters in April.
abstract: Roger Federer plans to make his comeback from knee surgery at the Monte Carlo Masters in April; other tennis news noted.
